metadata.title: Ourin - Next.js Boilerplate
metadata.description: An opinionated collection of components, hooks, and utilities for your Next.js project.

hero.title: The Ultimate
hero.subtitle: Ship your startup in record time. Packed with

features.title: Everything you need
features.subtitle: A complete foundation for building modern web applications with best practices baked in.

turbopack.title: Turbopack Ready
turbopack.description: Experience 10x faster builds with Next.js Turbopack. Pre-configured for optimal development experience.

fonts.title: 16 Premium Fonts
fonts.description: Carefully curated typography system with display, body, serif, mono, and handwriting fonts.

utilities.title: 185+ Utilities
utilities.description: Massive library of helper functions for strings, arrays, dates, validation, crypto, and more.

shadcn.title: shadcn/ui Ready
shadcn.description: Pre-configured with shadcn/ui for beautiful, accessible components out of the box.

typescript.title: Type Safe
typescript.description: Strict TypeScript throughout. No 'any' types, full IntelliSense support.

hooks.title: 20+ Custom Hooks
hooks.description: Production-ready hooks for debouncing, data fetching, countdown timers, and more.

i18n.title: i18n Built-in
i18n.description: Full internationalization support with next-intl. Easily add multiple languages.

middleware.title: Middleware Ready
middleware.description: Pre-configured middleware with security headers, CORS, and authentication patterns.

typography.title: 16 Beautiful Fonts
typography.subtitle: Pre-loaded with next/font for optimal performance. No layout shift, automatic optimization.

code.title: Code that sparks joy
code.subtitle: Intuitive utilities and hooks that feel like they should have been built into React.

updates.title: Version Updates
updates.subtitle: See what's been added in each release.

v13.title: v1.3 — Internationalization
v13.description: Full i18n support with next-intl. English and Indonesian included. Easy to add more languages.

v12.title: v1.2 — API & Middleware
v12.description: Example API routes with CRUD, pagination. Middleware with security headers and CORS.

v11.title: v1.1 — Extended Typography
v11.description: 10 new fonts added (total 16). Premium UI redesign with animations and gradient effects.

v10.title: v1.0 — Initial Release
v10.description: 145+ utilities, 15+ hooks, 6 fonts, shadcn/ui, Tailwind 4, Next.js 16, React 19.

cta.title: Ready to ship faster?
cta.subtitle: Start building your next project with Ourin today. Free, open source, and MIT licensed.

footer.description: The ultimate Next.js boilerplate for modern web development. Ship your startup in record time.
